mainText:
What a terrible loss. Steve was always an inspiration to me personally, 
an icon. He built a great company, drove the development of several 
great products, changed the face of computing as well as mobile and will 
definitely go down in history as an innovator of our time. Even after 
losing his company, he continued to succeed and once he regained Apple 
made it stronger than ever. I only wish I had the opportunity to meet 
him.
author: Jason
